meaningMnemonic: If the <radical>tsunami</radical> that's heading for your village is <radical>fat</radical> you should try to <kanji>select</kanji> a different one to hit instead. You don't want to select fat tsunamis because they do more damage.
readingMnemonic: If you're having trouble <kanji>select</kanji>ing which one is the least fat just check to see which tsunamis are eating <reading>ta</reading>cos (た). Only fat tsunamis will be eating them, so just look for one without a taco.
